subclause.title: SubClause
subclause.p: Where sprinklers are installed in a space housing lift electrical and control equipment, including machine rooms, secondary floors and sheave rooms, sprinklers in these spaces mustâ€”

ol.li: have heads protected from accidental damage by way of a guard that will not impair the performance of the head; and
be capable of being isolated and drained, either separately or collectively, without isolating any other sprinklers within the building.

subclause.title: SubClause
subclause.p: Valves provided to control sprinklers referred to in (1) must be installed in accordance with S17C10(2).
